title: Temporary Work (Skilled) visa (subclass 457)
summary: This page provides detailed information about the now‑closed Temporary Work (Skilled) visa (subclass 457). It explains the visa’s purpose, validity periods, requirements, legislative instruments, applicant obligations, and processes for those who previously held or applied for this visa.

visa_details.description: Allowed skilled workers to come to Australia and work for an approved business.
requirements_summary: Applicant must have been sponsored by an approved business.
Work only in nominated occupation and for sponsoring employer.

announced_by: Hon Malcolm Turnbull MP, Prime Minister of Australia
Hon Peter Dutton MP, Minister for Immigration and Border Protection

eligible_occupations.applicable_period: Nominations lodged on or after 17 January 2018

market_salary_rates_and_tsmit.description: TSMIT and market rates exemption level
Method for determining terms and conditions where no equivalent Australian worker exists

applicants.status: This visa is now closed to new applications

requirements: Family must have same levels of financial support as the primary applicant.
Sponsor must agree in writing to include family as secondary sponsored persons.
how_to_include: Sponsor includes family details in nomination application, or
Sponsor provides a letter attached to the visa application.

after_you_apply.application_management: Track and manage application using ImmiAccount

methods: Provide more information anytime until a decision is made.
Use Form 1023 to correct incorrect answers.
providing_more_information.if_other_information_is_received: Applicant will generally be given an opportunity to comment.

after_you_apply.reporting_changes: Applicants can report changes or withdraw applications.

how_long_visa_lasts.note: Check visa grant letter for exact expiry date; use VEVO if letter unavailable.

what_this_visa_lets_you_do: Work in Australia for an approved sponsor for the life of the visa
Bring family to work or study
Travel in and out of Australia freely

mandatory_conditions: Condition 8107: work only in nominated occupation
Work only for sponsoring employer (or associated entity if applicable)

employment_end_flexibility.total_limit: Up to 365 days across visa period

key_points: Legislative instruments govern occupation lists, English tests, training benchmarks, and labour market testing.
Visa holders must comply with strict work and sponsorship conditions.
